content: Iâ€™m a founder of Cirrus CI and we are about to release hosted Arm instances based on Graviton2 processors. But Iâ€™m wondering if you are interested in the next best thing which is Graviton2 based CI?
AFAIK we have a pretty powerful AArch64 machine for CI already, but I think that machine is only for use by rust-lang/rust
Got it. I didnâ€™t find any info on that so decided to message here. Never mind then. ðŸ‘Œ
@Jonas Schievink [he/him] that's a linux machine though, right? we don't run tests for aarch64 Mac, that's why it's tier 2 still
